opencache.lib package¶

Submodules¶

opencache.lib.opencachelib module¶

opencachelib.py: Core OpenCache functionality shared between controller and node.

exception opencache.lib.opencachelib.RemoteProcedureCallError(data, code)[source]¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

opencache.lib.opencachelib.create_directory(path)[source]¶

Create a new directory if it doesn’t exist.

opencache.lib.opencachelib.delete_directory(path)[source]¶

Removed an existing directory used for storing cached content specific to this HTTP server’s expression.

opencache.lib.opencachelib.do_json_post(host, port, post_data, path=None)[source]¶

Make a JSON call to given destination.

opencache.lib.opencachelib.do_json_rest_delete(host, port, _json, path)[source]¶

Format JSON request as REST with HTTP DELETE.

opencache.lib.opencachelib.do_json_rest_post(host, port, _json, path)[source]¶

Format JSON request as REST with HTTP POST.

opencache.lib.opencachelib.do_json_rpc_post(_id, method, host, port, _input=None)[source]¶

Format JSON request as JSON-RPC with HTTP POST.

Print a formatted error message if verbosity level permits.

Print a formatted error message if verbosity level permits.

Print a formatted information message if verbosity level permits.

opencache.lib.opencachelib.log_warn(tag, string)[source]¶

opencache.lib.opencachelib.send_json_rpc_error(JSONHandler, request_id, code, data=None)[source]¶

Send JSON error message in response to failed call.

opencache.lib.opencachelib.send_json_rpc_result(JSONHandler, request_id, result)[source]¶

Send JSON result message in response to successful call.

Setup logging functionality to both console and a rotating log file.
